nexoclom2.math¶

nexoclom.math package

Submodules¶

  • nexoclom2.math.histogram
  • nexoclom2.math.ks_test
  • nexoclom2.math.mod_close
  • nexoclom2.math.rotation_matrix

Classes¶

Histogram

Wrapper for np.histogram that makes the x-axis the center of each bin.

Histogram2d

Wrapper for np.histogram2d that makes the x,y axes the centers of each bin.

Functions¶

rotation_matrix(theta, axis)

Compute the rotation matrix for a rotation of theta about axis.

Package Contents¶

class nexoclom2.math.Histogram(a, bins=10, range=None, weights=None, density=None)¶

Wrapper for np.histogram that makes the x-axis the center of each bin. Returns a class with everything self-contained.

class nexoclom2.math.Histogram2d(ptsx, ptsy, bins=10, range=None, weights=None, density=None)¶

Wrapper for np.histogram2d that makes the x,y axes the centers of each bin. Returns a class with everything self-contained.

Compute the rotation matrix for a rotation of theta about axis.
